name: Coin Flipper (itch)
description:
A game which you are a cube that wants to reach an artifact that he has been looking for, for his whole life.

Try to succed doing all the levels because there are more of them coming soon

Notes :

  1. 20% of the game is finished
  2. It is still in beta mode
  3. There are only 4 levels till now
  4. There are optical illusions

You can ask any question in the comments or tell us if there are any bugs in the game and we will respond after minutes.
